translations: n.重击的人；异常巨大的东西；弥天大谎

phrs.translation: 敲击震源, 大吹牛, 异常高大的人

sentences.sentence: Spend a bit of time going around the fence, flower beds and pathways with a weed whacker (or yes a pair of scissors) and finish the job.
sentences.translation: 然后花点时间，拿把修剪刀(是的，就是把剪子)到篱笆、花坛、小径四处走走，完成这项工作。

sentences.sentence: Bruce Shapiro got me to design and build the UBW (USB Bit Whacker) project to solve his problem of disappearing parallel ports on computers.
sentences.translation: Bruce Shapiro找我来搞了个UBW项目(使用usb接口的驱动板)，以解决他电脑上没有并行接口的问题。
